title: Love You Forever
description: 'Love You Forever' is the final part of the 'Sofia' Trilogy.'Look After Each Other' and 'Sofia’s Legacy' (Books 1 and 2)It is 2010, five years since Sofia’s death. Dramatic and unimaginable events have changed the lives of all at Haslington Towers. It has been witnessed by those ‘upstairs’. More surprising events occur which lead to devastating consequences before a final decision at the end of the trilogy
author: Marilyn L. Rice
